db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: TextFieldStyle is part of Styling Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
background : Component
db:section.db:para: The background of the text field.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] control : TextField
db:section.db:para: The TextField this style is attached to.

db:section.db:title: padding group
db:section.db:para: This grouped property holds the top, left, right and bottom padding.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.4] passwordCharacter : string
db:section.db:para: The password character that is displayed when echoMode on the TextField is set to TextInput.Password or TextInput.PasswordEchoOnEdit.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.4.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.1] placeholderTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: The placeholder text color, used when the text field is empty.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.1] renderType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Override the default rendering type for the control.
The default value is platform dependent.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls.Styles 1.1.

db:section.db:title: selectedTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: The highlighted text color, used in selections.

db:section.db:title: selectionColor : color
db:section.db:para: The text highlight color, used behind selections.
